comment:
Retaste after a few months, bottle is at 2/5 volume. 
Nose: Balanced spice, malt, candied mango and tangerines.
Palate: Silken with cereal grains, malt and citrus notes 
Finish: Medium length, a little spicy with malt and citrus.
This is a great value buy.
Toffe, fruit and malt on the nose, smooth, sweet and creamy malt on the palate, a hint of smoke and spice on the medium finish. A fine value scotch blend for about $18 at Total Wine & More.
